<template>
<input v-model="store.ip" />

<button @click="triggerWood">Send wood now!</button>
  
</template>

<script>
import { store } from '../store'

export default {
  name: 'Settings',

  methods: {
    triggerWood(ip) {
      this.store.triggerWood = true;
    },
  },
}
</script>

<!-- Add "scoped" attribute to limit CSS to this component only -->
<style scoped>

</style>
